name: Mobile Charger
description:
Mobile Charger is a physics-driven action game where you try to keep your phone from dying by grabbing nearby electronic devices and using them to charge your own.

Grab devices, dodge traffic, and outrun the angry mobs to make your phone last as long as you can!

Controls

Move - WASD

Look - Mouse

Jump - Spacebar

Reset - Enter

Exit - Esc

Tools Used
  • Unity 2017
  • Visual Studio 2015
  • Blender
  • GIMP
  • Inkscape
  • Audacity
